cancel_successfully: The server's additional disk has been marked as cancelled.
create_successfully: The server's additional disk has been successfully created.
extend_disk_text: Extend your server's storage capabilities by attaching additional disks.

create_modal.create_additional_disk_text: Extend your server's disk space by attaching additional disks to it. Please keep in mind, while you can increase your disk's size at any time, you can't shrink it.
create_modal.name: Name
create_modal.name_label: Add an optional name to your disk to easily identify it.
create_modal.auto_format_choosing: When choosing Auto-Format we'll format your new disk with the file system of your choice. Furthermore we'll automatically mount it to your server and create a persistent fstab entry so it will be available after a restart as well.
create_modal.auto_format_choosing_not_restart: You don't need to restart your server; your new disk will be available on your server within a few seconds.
create_modal.manual_format_choosing: When choosing Manual (Professional Mode) we'll just attach a blank device to your server. In this case, formatting and mounting the disk needs to be done by you.
create_modal.manual_format_only: Only choose this option when you have sufficient experience with your operating system to handle those tasks on your own!
create_modal.server_price_monthly: will be added to your monthly server price
create_modal.by_clicking: By clicking on "Create Additional Disk" we'll immediately withdraw {immediate} from your balance. Your monthly server price will be increased by {monthlyDiskPrice} € to a total of {newMonthlyServerPrice} € per month.
create_modal.no_money: You don't have enough money on your account balance to settle the immediate payment of {immediate} €. Please consider charging your account balance, first.

cancel_modal.cancel_additional_disk_process: When proceeding, your additional disk will be marked as cancelled. The cancellation date of your additional disk is the end of your current runtime period. Therefore, your disk will be cancelled at.
cancel_modal.confirmation_text: Please enter the name of your disk ({name}) to confirm its cancellation.
cancel_modal.can_continue_use_disk: You can continue using your disk until the next extension of your server. Upon extension this disk will be deleted and your server's price will be adjusted.
cancel_modal.confirmation_text_note: Please note that it is not possible to prematurely cancel the disk and credit the remaining amount.
cancel_modal.by_clicking: By clicking on "Cancel Additional Disk" we'll mark your disk as cancelled. Your data will be deleted unrecoverably at the time of the next renewal (in {days} days).
cancel_modal.no_money: You don't have enough money on your account balance to settle the immediate payment of {immediate} €. Please consider charging your account balance, first.
